Package com.example.inventorymanager

package com.example.inventorymanager
  • Class
    Description
    filterItemsTest
    Tests the functionality of the filtering functions in chooseFilterFragment Ensures the items are properly filtered on basis of the user's input
    ImageSelectionFragment
    Logic for the image input choice dialog fragment.
    ImageSelectionFragment.OnImageOptionClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an image selection option is clicked.
    ImageUtility
    This is a utility class that contains helpful methods for handling image-related operations and validations.
    Item
    A representation of an item within the context of an inventory management system.
    ItemAdapter
    Displays the items being tracked by the inventory manager to the user.
    ItemFunctionalityTest
    Conducts comprehensive UI testing on fragments and item-related functionalities.
    ItemTest
    Tests the functionality of the Item() class.
    ItemUtility
    This is a utility class that contains helpful methods for handling item-related operations and validations.
    ItemViewModel
    The means by which the system interacts with the backend database.
    LoginActivity
    On app start, the user is met with the Login Activity.
    MainActivity
    The main activity in which the entire application operates.
    PhotoTesting
    Conducts comprehensive UI testing on the photos feature.
    ScanningTest
    Conducts comprehensive UI testing on the item scanning functionalities.
    sortItemsTest
    Tests the functionality of the sorting functions in SortOptionsFragment Ensures the items are properly sorted on basis of the user's input
    Tag
    A representation of a tag within the context of an inventory management system.
    TagAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying tags in a ListView or similar view components within an Android application.
    TagTesting
    Conducts comprehensive UI testing on item tags.
    TagViewModel
    A view model to manage the data for the addTagFragment.
    ViewTesting
    Conducts comprehensive UI testing.
